thread.title: 'Intolerable' heat waves forecast for Persian Gulf
thread.title_full: 'Intolerable' heat waves forecast for Persian Gulf

title: 'Intolerable' heat waves forecast for Persian Gulf
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: World - Today 
Heat in the Persian Gulf region will approach 'intolerable' levels in the decades ahead due to man-made global warming. ...
